roles.name: Sailor
roles.firstNightReminder: The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.
roles.otherNightReminder: The previously drunk player is no longer drunk. The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.
roles.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

roles.name: Chambermaid
roles.firstNightReminder: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.
roles.otherNightReminder: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.
roles.ability: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.

roles.name: Fortune Teller
roles.firstNightReminder: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for whether one of those players is the Demon.
roles.otherNightReminder: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Show the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for whether one of those players is the Demon.
roles.ability: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.

roles.name: Snake Charmer
roles.firstNightReminder: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.
roles.otherNightReminder: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.
roles.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.

roles.name: Monk
roles.otherNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Monk points to a player not themself. Mark that player 'Protected'.
roles.ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

roles.name: Lycanthrope
roles.otherNightReminder: The Lycanthrope points to a living player: if good, they die and no one else can die tonight.
roles.ability: Each night*, choose a living player: if good, they die, but they are the only player that can die tonight.

roles.name: Exorcist
roles.otherNightReminder: The Exorcist points to a player, different from the previous night. If that player is the Demon: Wake the Demon. Show the Exorcist token. Point to the Exorcist. The Demon does not act tonight.
roles.ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.

roles.name: Nightwatchman
roles.firstNightReminder: The Nightwatchman may point to a player. Wake that player, show the 'This character selected you' card and the Nightwatchman token, then point to the Nightwatchman player.
roles.otherNightReminder: The Nightwatchman may point to a player. Wake that player, show the 'This character selected you' card and the Nightwatchman token, then point to the Nightwatchman player.
roles.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn who you are.

roles.name: Courtier
roles.firstNightReminder: The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Courtier used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is drunk.
roles.otherNightReminder: Reduce the remaining number of days the marked player is poisoned. If the Courtier has not yet used their ability: The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Courtier used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is drunk.
roles.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.

roles.name: Seamstress
roles.firstNightReminder: The Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.
roles.otherNightReminder: If the Seamstress has not yet used their ability: the Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.
roles.ability: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.

roles.name: Pacifist
roles.ability: Executed good players might not die.

roles.name: Alchemist
roles.firstNightReminder: Show the Alchemist a not-in-play Minion token
roles.ability: You have a not-in-play Minion ability.

roles.name: Mayor
roles.ability: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

roles.name: Cannibal
roles.ability: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.

roles.name: Tinker
roles.ability: You might die at any time.

roles.name: Recluse
roles.ability: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

roles.name: Drunk
roles.ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

roles.name: Moonchild
roles.otherNightReminder: If the Moonchild used their ability to target a player today: If that player is good, they die.
roles.ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.

roles.name: Poisoner
roles.firstNightReminder: The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
roles.otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
roles.ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

roles.name: Devil's Advocate
roles.firstNightReminder: The Devil’s Advocate points to a living player. That player survives execution tomorrow.
roles.otherNightReminder: The Devil’s Advocate points to a living player, different from the previous night. That player survives execution tomorrow.
roles.ability: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.

roles.name: Witch
roles.firstNightReminder: The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.
roles.otherNightReminder: If there are 4 or more players alive: The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.
roles.ability: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

roles.name: Scarlet Woman
roles.otherNightReminder: If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today: Show the 'You are' card, then the demon token.
roles.ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don’t count)

roles.name: Pukka
roles.firstNightReminder: The Pukka points to a player. That player is poisoned.
roles.otherNightReminder: The Pukka points to a player. That player is poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies.
roles.ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.

roles.name: Vigormortis
roles.otherNightReminder: The Vigormortis points to a player. That player dies. If a Minion, they keep their ability and one of their Townsfolk neighbours is poisoned.
roles.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbour. [−1 Outsider]

roles.name: Fang Gu
roles.otherNightReminder: The Fang Gu points to a player. That player dies. Or, if that player was an Outsider and there are no other Fang Gu in play: The Fang Gu dies instead of the chosen player. The chosen player is now an evil Fang Gu. Wake the new Fang Gu. Show the 'You are' card, then the Fang Gu token. Show the 'You are' card, then the thumb-down 'evil' hand sign.
roles.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]
